1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Repetitive operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Repeat
6 ( -- * Repetitive
7   min, max, minMax,
8   many, many1, maybe,
9   before, sep,
10 ) where
11
12import Prelude hiding ( min, max, maybe )
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr                as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax              as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Combine    as S
17
18-- | Repetition with lower bound.
19min :: Int -> S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
20min a = S.ERec . S.ERep (S.Min a)
21
22-- | Repetition upper bound.
23max :: Int -> S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
24max = minMax 0
25
26-- | Repetition with lower and upper bound.
27minMax :: Int -> Int -> S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
28minMax a b = S.ERec . S.ERep (S.MinMax a b)
29
30-- | Match zero or more times.
31many :: S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
32many = min 0
33
34-- | Match one or more times.
35many1 :: S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
36many1 = min 1
37
38-- | Match zero or one times.
39maybe :: S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
40maybe = minMax 0 1
41
42-- | Match before given expression.
43before :: S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
44before = many . S.anyNot
45
46-- | X-separated values.
47sep :: S.Expr a -> S.Expr a -> S.Expr a
48sep x e = S.seq [many $ S.seq [e, x], maybe e]
